author: vmassol
msg: moved the runGenericTest() method from ServletTestCase to AbstractTestCase as it is a general behaviour that will also be useful for the FilterTestCase

author: vmassol
msg: removed semaphore (ResultHolder) as it is no longer needed (it was there to prevent test result to be read before the test was finished and the results written to the context). However as we use a AutoReadHttpURLConnection on the client side, this ensures that the test execution will always happen before the second HTTP request to read the results.

author: vmassol
msg: Added Orion 1.5 to the list of supported servers

author: vmassol
msg: positionned Cactus amongst the several unit testing frameworks
